question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take a turn and move straight the road on this building road. turn around and move straight and turn left side road. and cross the lake and near by the building. take a turn and turn left and move to top of the building. top of the building and nearby the lake and cross the right side of the building.]. At the initial position, you are asked to move according to a series of movement instructions. When you reach your current location, what is your Landmark Position from the lake?  
choose:  
A. I am on the right side of the lake.  
B. I am on the lake.  
C. I am far away from the lake.  
D. I am on the left side of the lake.  
E. I am below the lake.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: A; Reason: The final frames show a view from the top of a building with the lake visible to the left side, indicating that the current position is on the right side of the lake.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 5), (42, 50), (110, 126)]
Option: [A]
Reason: The video starts with a view of the lake. The instructions mention crossing the lake and being near the building. The final view from the top of the building shows the lake to the left. Therefore, the current position is on the right side of the lake.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: A; Reason: The final frames show a view from the top of a building with the lake visible to the left side, indicating that the current position is on the right side of the lake.
